name: Nova Capital Management
overview:
The typical market transaction involves the sale of one company at a time. However, there are situations where disposing of holdings in a number of businesses, in a single transaction, brings significant benefits - together with substantial time and cost efficiencies.

Whether seeking a solution to illiquidity, the disposal of legacy assets or the freedom to implement strategic change, Nova offers the corporate and financial sellers an efficient and market value solution. Unlocked from their holdings, investors and owners are better positioned to focus on the benefits and opportunities this significant step change brings.

Although principally an acquirer, Nova can also work with investors in private equity funds, where there is the need for a Replacement Manager or General Partner.

milestones.description: Nova Capital Mangement, sold German based nuclitec GmbH and its French and US based sister companies to Eckert & Ziegler Strahlen-und Medizintechnik AG for an undisclosed amount. The firm is in the market for a $300 million first fund, LBO Wire wrote.
